attributes.action: Prioritise funeral workers for Covid Vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: These brilliant people visit various premises daily from private homes to hospitals and hospices. They really do care for our loved ones when there is no longer anything we can do for them, let’s protect them and put them up their with other key workers that are being vaccinated.  Not only to protect them, but protect other workers they need to work with to do their job.
attributes.background: Please add those that work in the funeral industry to the vaccine priority list. These unsung heroes are also on the frontline among our valiant drs and nurses putting themselves at risk.
